name: BLOCK!!
description:
Block!! is a 2D block puzzle game for mobile device.

Germs are growing inside of a jar. Suddenly, a shine of light broke through a crack on the bottle. Germs must use their body surface to block the shape of the crack to prevent the sun from killing the whole colony.

In each level, there will be a specific shape composed by blocks. This is the crock where sunlight will come in. Players will drag jigsaw pieces formed by germs to cover this crock. Players can drag jigsaw pieces back from crock and change their positions on this crock.

This game wants to give players a relaxing experience. Players have unlimited chances to try different combinations as well as improve spatial imagination ability. If the jigsaw is finished, sunlight will be blocked, and the player gets victory. There will be three level in this game.

Let’s save the germs and have fun!
